title: Reason for the decline in the use of wood as fuel

content.question: The primary cause for the decline in the use of wood as a fuel in the eighteen hundreds was the

choices.label: discovery of major oil fields in the Middle East
lowering of per capita energy consumption
reduced wood availability resulting from widespread deforestation
global rise in temperatures during the 1800s
lower energy density of coal as compared to wood

content.answer: reduced wood availability resulting from widespread deforestation
